subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Michael Barrett punched A. J. Pierzynski in the jaw after a home-plate collision between the two catchers, and the Cubs-White Sox rivalry boiled over in a melee that led to four ejections.
snippet: Michael Barrett punched A. J. Pierzynski in the jaw after a home-plate collision between the two catchers, and the Cubs-White Sox rivalry boiled over in a melee that led to four ejections.
